name: Administrator Account
effect: +3 to Computer's System Resources

name: Antivirus
effect: Uninstall 1 'Virus' mod

name: BattleEye Anti-Cheat
effect: Can play on another player's computer that has a 'Cheat' mod installed. Skip player's next turn.

name: Burstable Internet Uplink
effect: +3 To Bandwidth this turn

name: CC Cleaner
effect: Move all installed gameplay and cheat mods to your mods folder

name: Cheat Engine
effect: Can choose which mods to uninstall

name: Clean Configuration File
effect: Change a mod on a computer from 'Buggy' to 'Clean'

name: Dirty Configuration File
effect: Change a mod on a computer from 'Clean' to 'Buggy'

name: Firewall
effect: Prevents any mods from being installed by other players on your computer until your next turn

name: Forum Reputation
effect: +2 To Coins received when selling on 'The Forums' This Turn

name: Fresh Install
effect: Move all mods to your Mod Folder. Discard all 'Virus' Mods.

name: Honeypot
effect:
May be played in response to a 'Virus' Mod being installed on your system.
Immediately discard the next Mod installed on your system, then discard this card.

If played out of turn, the cost is taken away from your Bandwidth at the start of the next maintenance phase.

name: Loud, Clicky, Scratchy Keyboard
effect: Annoys your friends. Stop it.\n(Does Nothing)

name: Mass Configuration Modifications
effect: Change all mods on a computer that are 'Clean' to 'Buggy' and all mods that are 'Buggy' to 'Clean'

name: Metasploit
effect: Allows you to install mods and system settings on other player's computers

name: Messy Desk
effect: How can you live like this?\n(Does Nothing)

name: Mod Loader
effect: Installing mods costs 1 less Bandwidth this turn (Minimum 0).

name: Mod Manager
effect: Draw 4 mod cards. Pick one and either install or put it in your mods folder. Shuffle the rest into the mods deck.

name: Multi-Factor Authentication
effect: Immediately discard all 'Cheat' Mods installed. Cannot install 'Cheat' Mods. +2 To Bandwidth

name: Offline
effect:
Until your next turn you cannot:
- Install mods or system settings on any other player's computers
- Have mods installed or system settings by other players
- Draw any cards

name: Overclocking
effect: When a system crash would occur, instead discard this setting and prevent it until the end of your NEXT maintenance phase

name: Registry Editor
effect: The next card you draw is free (does not have to be on this turn), then this discard this card

name: Remote Access Tool
effect: Allows you to install system settings on other player's computers

name: Scriptkiddie
effect: Install or uninstall 1 mod or system setting from another player's computer, or negate 1 system setting from another player's computer until your next turn

name: YouTube Hacking Tutorial
effect: Install or uninstall 1 mod or system setting from another player's computer
